评论详情: These fit extremely well with a stretchy waist for comfort. The material is extremely soft and almost satiny to touch. I was concerned about them being too short but they cover the backside well. Great for working out, theme parks, outside activities. I purchased a second pair because they’re so cute & comfortable

These are the best shorts I have ever owned! I love the high waisted band and how it hides my lower stomach and the stretchy side pocket fits my phone perfectly. It's a stretchy material so it doesn't feel restrictive and you can actually breathe in them. They're super soft too! You can wear these casually or to the gym. While running at the gym I did notice they rode up a little bit it wasn't bad. I usually wear a large but I found the large had too much material for my fit so I went with the medium which Amazon actually recommended for me to begin with lol. I'm 5'3", 145lbs. These are definitely staying in my regular rotation.

Very cute, flowy, feminine shorts. I ordered a 2XL and a 3XL and there is virtually no difference in size between them, but both fit comfortably and are very stretchy. My fellow thick-thighed friends might struggle a bit with some Ride up like I did but it’s not too terrible. Side pocket perfect for a phone.
These fit great and really nice material. They were so comfortable. True to size. Worked great for our Disney trip. Would buy again.
So soft, so comfy. No squeezing, very flattering.

These are SO COMFY and soft! They’re not loose enough to fall off, but not tight like normal athletic style clothes. They’re great for lounging at home or working out. I’m a size 16 and I feel completely covered and the way the fabric hangs hides the stomach area well. I’m very happy with them.

I wear these so often. They are my favorite pair of shorts! I will be getting more eventually. I have worked out in them and wore them to theme parks. They hold up super well and dry very easily/quickly. They are flowy and cute and hold in my mommy pouch and stomach. Obsessed with these.
These are so soft and so comfortable! I will be buying in other colors.

I’m on the wider side for hips and these were still very flattering on me. The liner shorts stayed in place better than I expected (no short stays in place perfectly) the electric blue color was accurate to the picture. I’m 5’6  160lb and they were modest enough for me
I have these in two colors and need more. They are my favorite shorts!!
Super soft and so comfortable.

I really like these shorts, they are my favorite by far, they do tend to ride up on me but that because of my body shape, I unfortunately lost the string in the wash so I would recommend tying them in knots before washing

As a millennial mom - I am trying to stay on top of the new fashions, and after seeing them all summer wanted “flow-y” shorts. I typically buy name brand athletic shorts for jogging, but wasn’t read to spend big on this style. All that to say- I am very happy with these! The material is not the highest quality, so I use them more for lounging than exercise. The fit is comfortable, and the built it under layer is a great asset.
Absolutely love the fit and feel of these shorts. Only complaint is the amount of wrinkles.
Love these shorts. I get so many compliments when I wear them.  I love the thick band its flattering on your waist!

I loved these immediately. I bought 3 or 4 different brands to try them out and a lot of them didn’t fit right, but these were perfect! I like to cover my tummy and for it to come up higher on my waist, but be a little more form fitting and these were perfect for that. Great quality, stretchy, and just the right length. I haven’t worn them to exercise yet so I’m not sure what that’ll be like but 10/10 recommend either way. I did size up just in case and I’m glad I did. I normally wear an XL in this type of stuff but I was nervous about fit so I bought one of both size and the 2XL is loose and tight where I need it! I may edit once I try on the other size. I loved these so much I immediately went and bought 4 other colors!!

Super soft and fit great! Love the stretch in the waistband and how flowy they are. Only reason they don’t get 5 stars is because of the shorts underneath. They’re not too bad, I just find myself pulling them down a lot.
Super comfy, perfect for sightseeing/ a lot of walking. My only complaint is that they wrinkle super easily and the liner rolls up quite a bit

The younger athletic girls all wear these and they looked so comfortable so I purchased a pair for myself.  While I do not look like "them", the fit is flattering for my body type, the stretch is good around my waist, and they look nice with any simple top.  I do find that they tend to rise up around my midsection when I am wearing them and the waist band is very thick so I have to keep pulling them down which is slightly annoying, however, this may just be the fit on my body type (larger in the midsection, smaller legs).  I purchased the black and would purchase more colors in the future.

I got the white and it almost has a bluish tint to it. Not sure if that's normal for this product due to the material. But it's very light so I'm going to keep them! I'm a size 10-12 and ordered the large. They fit perfectly!

I love these shorts! They are perfect for my nightly walks. I've worn them to work when we have to move furniture and they are amazing! I typically wear a size 16 in jeans. I bought an XL and they fit perfectly. The bike shorts under do ride up on occasion but I have yet to find a pair of shorts that don't do that. Highly recommend these
I am 5’10” and weigh around 155 lbs. these are great, but I’m not super in shape so I had some fat hanging over with the size large. I know this is a very specific review, but I hope it helps!
Ordered a small and they sent an extra small. Happy accident since it fits. The material is very soft.  Quite comfortable and fits my phone nicely. Does not ride up at all.
These are so adorable and so comfortable for working out, and dancing. The only thing is I wish that they had pockets!
Picture looks like this may be a skirt with shorts underneath, but it is actually shorts. Super soft material and comfy! high waisted and fits tts

Look more expensive than they are. Cover the mom pooch and are comfortable to wear after a section since they are high rise. I wear my usual size in these shorts even postpartum since they have a lot of stretch.

I have seen these all over TikTok and really wanted a cute pair without having to use their shop. I bought a couple different pairs but these are my absolute favorite. They are buttery soft, stretchy, comfortable and flowy. I prefer a higher waisted sitting short which I got with these. They have pockets which is always a plus. If I had to criticize anything it would be that they could be just slightly longer. For reference I’m 5’7 and 125lbs and went with a size medium.

I have a ton of workout shorts and these are by far my favorite pair. I like how it kinda looks like I have a skirt on, so I feel really feminine in them, but it also allows me to do a good workout with them on. They don’t write up the butt cheeks like most shorts do. Going to buy a couple more pair cause I love them so much!!
Got so many compliments on these shorts. They are very durable, fit perfectly, the color is super vibrant, and they have pockets! Going to get more in another color.

I have a Joylab pair from Target that I love but the biker shorts underneath ride up on my booty and I’m tugging in public. These do not ride up and they are so butter soft. I am 5’7”, 130 lb, and a mom of 3. I usually get a small, but went with a medium because I wanted the shorts to be slightly longer and I don’t want form fitting shorts. I could have done small or medium but the medium is perfect. They are super stretchy so if you’re in between sizes you really can’t go wrong either way. They’re flattering and comfortable. Get them!
Very comfortable but fits a little big so I suggest going down a size. We got a small and wear medium and it fit perfect.
These are my fave shorts! Love them. I have bigger thighs so these are perfect for me.

Love these! They fit as described, you can't see through them, I had ordered white, they flow & look great on! I've washed them twice in a delicate, cold cycle. Quick toss in the dryer to get wrinkles out, then hang them to completely air dry. I've received numerous compliments. I'm 5'3", 128 lbs & ordered a medium. Definitely will purchase these again in a different color.
Super cute but definitely short. I have an athletic build with thicker legs and I prefer longer shorts. But for those who like shorter shorts, these are great! Super comfy.

These shorts are SO comfortable and flattering. I am 5’10” and 170 lbs, I got a medium and they hit in all the right places. They don’t seem to ride up and they are breezy, cool, and the material is so soft. I can’t wait to wear them to the gym and Disney world and I will be buying more soon.
Size is as expected. Material is thick.

Saw these shorts on TikTok and came to Amazon to buy. I was not expecting them to be as soft as they are. So soft and super comfortable. I'm 5'9", and in these pictures I'm 200lbs, typically wear a size 12. I ordered the XL and probably could order the L and still have it be comfortable, but I didn't want the compression shorts underneath to cut into my thighs. I wanted them to be comfy. There is a pocket on the right side.

They are extremely soft and stretchy, and they perfectly cover my mom pooch! I’ve never felt comfortable wearing a crop top until I bought these. The spandex shorts do ride up, but I have thicker thighs so all spandex does that to me. I absolutely love them, and I’ve already ordered them in 2 other colors!
Perfect, for beach day, days at the park or lounging around.
Absolutely love these shorts my friend recommended them and i quickly ordered them, i got a size x-large and they fit perfectly! not too tight and super comfortable.
They arrived quickly. They were pretty cute and very comfortable - however they were not flattering so I ended up returning them.
These run BIG, size down.

I ordered an XXL, I weigh 200 lbs with a waist of 35 inches and hips of 44inches and I am 5”6. They are a little big so I would say size down once but regardless I love them and will be ordering more!!
Cute and I love them but they do roll up.

评论概述: Great shorts but they stain your skin
评论详情: I wore these for a run and they were awesome. I washed them, then I wore them to a hot yoga class. The sweat ended up causing the shorts to stain my skin lol. It washed off in the shower, but just an fyi!
I ordered this at another color and loved it, but the black was not high waisted.
True to size, very stretchy and fabric is very light and cool to the touch. Wore them to a theme park and never got hot. Would buy again!
They fit great! The packaging was a little disappointing and was open.

The fit of these are great. I’m normally an 18 and bought the 2x and they fit very comfortably and I think I could’ve even sized down. They’re super comfortable and don’t cut in or ride up. The reason for the lower rating is the material doesn’t really match the price, the material is like cheap swimsuit material and I feel like they kind of look like bathing suit bottoms, for the price I wish the material was nicer quality and less shiny and thin.

Beautiful skirt. After reading the review I actually sized down and it worked for me! The high waist hit exactly at the waist not my ribs. It very light weight and comfortable. Love the flow of the skirt and the coverage of the shorts. Definitely recommend.
Cute but they go weirdly high up the waist. I have to roll the fabric down to make it look right

I bought these is a Small. For reference, I'm 5'4" and 132lbs. These are super comfortable and I've can never been able to find anything to cover my mom pooch (mama of 3 here) to be able to wear a crop top. Definitely ordering more and highly recommend!
Fit tts and very soft
These shorts are great very cute and true to size. These are also very well made I have washed them several times with no color bleeding or damage to the shorts
I absolutely love these shorts. They fit perfectly and are so soft and the quality feels amazing

Love these ! Very comfortable. Super soft! Inside shorts are very stretchy ! Colors are fantastic ! I have 3 different colors - light pink looks more peachy online, it’s actually light pink like it says. I’m 5’6” 135 lbs with a fit body type have them in a medium and small they both fit. However The medium is just a little looser in the waist. I would say the small fits me better - if you have a similar body type as me but you have a thicker waist I would definitely go with the medium.

评论概述: Cute, but ride up for me
评论详情: Loved how it looked. Pretty colors. I’m 5’2”, 135lbs and got the medium and the ride up was annoying for my jogs.
I bought 2 pairs of these and I'm going to get a third. Super cute, comfy and has a pocket for my phone! Love these!
buying my 3rd pair.  so comfortable… like wearing silk PJs.  very flattering.  love the design.
These are really cute . I ordered 2. Dressy or casual , comfortable and classy . I ordered size L, 5’8, 160 lbs

I love that the built in running shorts fit tightly. Helps keep the shorts in place. They’re kind of silky and flowy and so comfy. I got wet at the splash pad with my kids and they dried off very quickly. The waistband is super flattering and supportive. I want every color!!
Love, they don't ride up, attractive appearance, good quality, what you would expect. So comforable. The blue makes you look tan and is a fun summer color.
Love these. Very comfy!
These are so comfy & stretchy. Just get them, I promise you won’t regret it!
Usually very leery of purchasing clothes off Amazon, but these fit great! The material is super soft, the band is comfortable on your waist and the shorts underneath don’t roll
Stretchy and light with fun colors! Super thin great for high temperatures. They do ride up a bit but over all love these shorts. Good chance I’ll order more.

Are these super comfortable? Yes. Will they start to fray in the washing machine after 2-3 washes? Also yes. I washed these alone when I first got them to prevent any color transfer to other clothes of mine and dried them in low heat. While I can’t see these lasting a year, they were perfect to bring on a beach vacation.  Would recommend washing these in a bra bag to prevent excessive fraying.  Sizing guide is more accurate than the reviews in my opinion. And I ordered both the blue and white - neither were see-through for me :)

评论概述: Cute shorts but they ride up.
评论详情: I really like these shorts but they ride/roll up. I have thicker thighs so that may be just my issue. I sized up to try and help with this issue but they still roll up. Aside from that they are adorable and very comfortable. The fabric is lightweight and breathable. The side pocket fits my iPhone perfectly w/o dragging the shorts down. Definitely recommend!
Fits true to size, but I feel like the sizing is kinda flexible so if you sized up because you like a less snug waistband, they’d still fit everywhere else too.
Great fit, looks great, booty hugging

评论概述: Will live in these this summer!!
评论详情: I have to admit, I had low expectations for these - just wanted a pair of shorts that wasn’t biker shorts. The fabric on these are softer than anything I’ve ever gotten from lululemon, and the fit is so comfortable and cute. I will definitely be ordering more. The only thing I will say, I got the red and the color is much more of a pink - but still so insanely soft and comfortable.

评论概述: Color pink was too skin toned
评论详情: Loved the comfort and quality of these shorts! However, the mauve/pink color specifically was almost skin color matching to me and looked weird, as if I was no bottoms on, so I did not keep them. I did get them in black though and they are my favorite shorts!!!
They have pockets in the undershorts!
These shorts are a really cute color, but a really awkward fit. There’s something about the underneath biking shorts that are a little bit too long to look right.
great purchase, will probably order another color too. very comfortable and flattering. Ran a 5k race in them and they stayed put and where extremely comfortable.
I loved these so much I bought them in black! So comfortable
These fit great and wonderful to workout in.

I bought these for my barbie bday party, and they were the perfect color, they had just the right amount of coverage, and i love how high waisted they are! After one wash they started to roll up a little bit at the bottom (let them air dry after washing), but it’s not noticeable. Also, be careful what you wash it with because it might get colored from the shorts.
This pair is super comfortable silky material great for working out or running errands. I’m size 10 and got the extra large.
Fit well, comfortable, nice fabric
These were my go-to shorts for our trip to Zion. I got a large but returned them for a medium as the waist is super stretchy. Love them!

I was looking for a pair of workout shorts that were more modest. THESE are amazing!! The softest, and most comfortable workout shorts I’ve ever worn. Normally they’re too tight and hug in the wrong places but these are just 🤌🏻 buttery soft. Only comment is the white has a blue hint to it compared to my white top, but that’s fine.
Great looking skorts!
My favorite shorts! And the spandex underneath doesn’t roll which is so nice! Highly recommend!!

评论概述: Size up for length but may be too big on your waist
评论详情: I have a smaller waist but i don’t like when shorts ride up when im running - im usually an XS in bottoms but i sized up to a S - the length is perfect and not too short but the waist is gappy even with the drawstrings tightened an absurd amount. Going to go on a run in them and see how they feel.
These shorts are the comfiest things I have ever owned! Quality is also amazing!! I will be ordering more 🥰
I like to run competitively and while these are super cute, they are a bit heavy so I leave them for my recovery runs. Would still buy again though!
Purchase these shorts, they are like lulus but run a size small
Love these - MAKE SURE TO HANDWASH THEY STAIN EVERYTHING IF YOU DO NOT PREWASH

评论概述: Perfect workout and going out shorts
评论详情: This short skirt is wonderful for working out and going out. It has a pocket on side for phone. Feels great
Love these shorts, look super cute

i sized up to the 3XL to be on the safe side, & they fit great! i could have worn the XL or XXL but the top layer wouldn’t have been as flowy as i wanted. they are super stretchy & comfortable & will be great for summer!
These shorts are buttery soft, light, comfortable and flattering. Went on a run and had no issues at all.
These shorts are so soft and flowy. They do not ride up at all.
These shorts are so soft and comfortable. Both 2, will be buying in more colors. Love, love , love them.
These are super comfy and a throwback to my childhood!
Very comfortable, super soft fabric. Not really my style but will keep for lounging. Could’ve sized down, normally a size small.
I bought these shorts in three different colors! I love the tighter shorts underneath and the pocket! Perfect shorts for Disney World or any theme park.
My daughter loves these. Super cute, comfortable and light weight!
Fit small
